[Hostwelt](https://hostwelt.de/en/shared-hosting.html), located in **Frankfurt-am-Main, Germany** , offers premium-class cPanel shared hosting based on HP ProLiant platforms and RAID-10 SSD arrays. 
Great connectivity to DE-CIX internet exchange point and more than 120Gbps own uplinks to major carriers. 

Today we are here to offer a limited-time mega discount, use promo code "LET75OFF" to have **75% RECURRING LIFETIME DISCOUNT!** for first 100 users only!

Our standard pricing:

https://hostwelt.de/en/shared-hosting.html


All Plans Include:
- HP Proliant Gen9 DL120 servers, XEON E5-2620 processors

- cPanel control panel

- Premium high quality unmetered 100 Mbit/s bandwith

- Tier III+ DC - Global Switch, Frankfurt-am-Main, Germany

- Fully redundant network and power connections

- Softaculous Auto Installer

- 100% Raid 10 SSD arrays, P440/4G SmartArray controllers, 4GB cash

- Dedicated IP addresses available

- Automated backups

- 10 days free testing period
